title: Labels and Features: The Key Building Blocks of Machine Learning Predictions
author: Maryam
summary: Labels and features form the backbone of machine learning. Learn what they are, how they interact in supervised learning, and why feature engineering is critical for improving model performance.
seo_title: Labels and Features in Machine Learning: Definitions, Examples & Feature Engineering
seo_description: Understand labels and features in machine learning. Learn their roles, the importance of feature engineering, and how they affect accuracy in supervised learning.
seo_keywords: labels in machine learning, features in machine learning, feature engineering ML, supervised learning labels features, ML model predictions
